text:
Looking for someone able to deal with an issue we have.
We have a tool that create tickets.
This same tool send mail to Partner.
Those mail are not stored in conversation as not sent from HubSpot.
When a partner reply we want to store the conversation and associate the ticket that was created initially.
We can store the mail into HubSpot if we add an HubSpot mail  address but we need a way to associate this conversation to the ticket.
I suppose we should include a ticket tracking code in the initial mail we send... And when partner reply, this ticket tracking code is stored in the mail and  HubSpot can associate the conversation to this ticket.
Thank you guys
